title: Case-Based Microlearning Course in Geriatric Psychiatry

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of psychiatry and neuroscience
context.additional_context: Strengthening core competencies in geriatric psychiatry through case-based discussions and learner-participatory activities in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: One can distinguish major psychiatric symptoms in elderly patients (dementia, depression, etc.) using at least three diagnostic criteria
Through case discussions, one can develop treatment plans considering social and biological factors of elderly patients
Improve self-directed learning competencies by utilizing digital resources provided on mobile learning platforms
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
